Text:

I have downloaded and installed sr1, but still nothing happens - Any surgentions?

Thanx for great programmes
for rhino sr2 is out

I think im having the same problems as jjaworsk. I can start the material editor, but the studio crashes when I start it. Any ideas? Im very thankful for suggestions. I've even downloade other cracks and tried them but with the same result. Please help.
I got same problem... Studio crashes but editor works.. How to fix it? I really need this one...

Everything is working for me, but I cannot make the Rhino plug-in work. I have the same message as mbching. Very sad, because I really need this plug-in to work. Without it this renderer is nothing. Somebody know how to solve the problem?
Works perfectly for me using Vista, Rhino plugin will not install however.  Anyone seen the 64b version?
Yes, 64bit version would be REALLY nice. It's 21st century now after all...
anybody got the form z plug-in to work? Cant make it work....
studio works fine tho....

Is the plugin for Google Sketchup included in this release? 
Thanks in advance!
/Jimmie
Rhino plug-in works as long as you have a SYSTEM ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE that points to maxwell and not a USER ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE.  Google these terms if you don't know what they are.......
Anyone have the Solidworks x64 plugin for Vista?  The one i am using is having a problem with the MXI crashing.

Hello Yellowgowild, I too can't seem to find any exe files etc as stated in the read me. Any ideas on this, downloaded twice and installed twice but maxwell is a trial version at the mo for me.

Regards,
G

for those having a problem with a plug-in. first make sure that you have the proper service release installed. i believe the newest is SR6. if you dont have it, you can search for it . then to make sure you have the proper SYSTEM ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE follow the instructions on this website. -> http://www.itechtalk.com/thread3595.html . 

fuzzo was right. you have a USER environment  variable. now you have to add a NEW systems environment variable.  the variable & it's value should be the same as the one in the User Environment Variable.

you should be set after that
